footer.subscribeText: Stay updated with our latest news and updates.
footer.description: We are dedicated to making a positive difference in the lives of those in need.

hero.title: Make a Real Difference Together
hero.subtitle: Support our mission to help those in need and create lasting positive change.

supportCategories.subtitle: Join us in making a difference

donate.title: Donate
donate.description: Your financial support helps us provide essential services to those in need.

volunteer.description: Give your time and skills to help us make a bigger impact in the community.

sponsor.description: Become a corporate sponsor and support our programs while enhancing your brand.

fundraise.description: Start your own fundraising campaign to support our causes and initiatives.

educational.title: Educational Support
educational.description: Providing scholarships and educational materials to underprivileged children.

healthcare.title: Healthcare Access
healthcare.description: Bringing medical care and supplies to communities without adequate healthcare.

facilities.title: Facility Renovation
facilities.description: Renovating community centers to create safe spaces for education and support.

cta.title: Join Us in Making a Difference
cta.description: Every contribution matters, no matter how small. Together, we can create a brighter future for children in need.

ourTeam.title: Our Dedicated Team
ourTeam.subtitle: Meet the people behind our mission

johndoe.name: John Doe
johndoe.bio: John has 15 years of experience in nonprofit management and is passionate about social justice.

janedoe.name: Jane Doe
janedoe.bio: Jane oversees our day-to-day operations and ensures our programs run efficiently.

alicesmith.name: Alice Smith
alicesmith.bio: Alice manages our volunteer program and helps match volunteers with suitable opportunities.

bobwilliams.name: Bob Williams
bobwilliams.bio: Bob leads our fundraising efforts and develops strategies to secure resources for our programs.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide support, resources, and hope to vulnerable communities, working together to create a more equitable and compassionate world.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A world where every person has access to the resources, opportunities, and support they need to thrive.

history.title: Our History
history.description: Founded in 2010, our organization began as a small community initiative and has grown into an international nonprofit serving thousands annually.

milestones.2010: Founded as a local community support group
milestones.2022: Opened regional offices in three countries

compassion.title: Compassion
compassion.description: We approach our work with empathy and understanding, recognizing the dignity of every person we serve.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We maintain the highest ethical standards in all our operations and are transparent with our supporters.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: We believe in working together with communities, partners, and supporters to create sustainable change.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously seek creative solutions to complex challenges and adapt our approaches based on evidence.

howToHelp.title: How to Help
howToHelp.subtitle: Join us in making a difference

donate.title: Make a Donation
donate.subtitle: Your financial support helps us continue our mission

confirmations.donation: Thank you for your generous donation! Your support makes our work possible.
confirmations.volunteer: Thank you for your interest in volunteering! We'll contact you shortly to discuss next steps.
confirmations.contact: Thank you for reaching out! We'll get back to you as soon as possible.

overview.title: Financial Overview
overview.description: We are committed to financial transparency and accountability. Below you can find detailed information about our income sources and how we allocate funds.

annualReports.title: Annual Reports & Financial Statements
annualReports.description: Our annual reports and audited financial statements are available for download below.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: We provide clear, accurate information about how donations are used and make our financial statements publicly available.

stewardship.title: Stewardship
stewardship.description: We carefully manage all resources entrusted to us, maximizing the impact of every donation while minimizing administrative costs.

accountability.title: Accountability
accountability.description: We maintain rigorous internal controls and undergo regular independent audits to ensure fiscal responsibility.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.subtitle: We're here to answer your questions

form.name: Your Name
form.subject: Subject
form.success: Thank you for your message! We'll get back to you soon.
form.error: There was an error sending your message. Please try again.

donate.question: How can I donate?
donate.answer: You can donate online through our secure form, mail a check to our address, or contact us to discuss other donation methods.

volunteer.question: How can I volunteer?
volunteer.answer: Please fill out our volunteer application form, and a member of our team will contact you to discuss opportunities that match your skills and availability.

taxDeductible.question: Are donations tax-deductible?
taxDeductible.answer: Yes, all donations are tax-deductible to the extent allowed by law. We provide receipts for all donations.

corporatePartnership.question: How can my company partner with you?
corporatePartnership.answer: We offer various partnership opportunities for companies. Please contact our partnerships team to discuss how we can work together.
